name: English Roast Fillet of Beef With Two Sauces

ingredients.name: fillet of beef ask your butcher to tie it into a log
horseradish cream with dried cherries see recipe

instructions: Preheat the oven to 475 degrees. Place the fillet in a roasting pan. Combine the herbs, oil, salt and pepper in a small bowl, mix well and rub all over the fillet. Roast for 20 minutes (for medium-rare). Remove the pan from the oven, loosely cover the fillet with aluminum foil and let rest for 10 minutes before carving into thin slices. Serve with accompanying sauces.
